name: Heaven Rotter
description:
A short moving camera platformer made for Mini Jam 119: Heaven (2)! with the limitation Everything Can Die, I decided to extend that to the platforms, rotting away under your touch as you attempt to climb your way to heaven.

Left/Right arrow keys to move,
[Z] to Jump
[X] to Dash

Jumps are reset when landing, and you get 2.
Dash is on a 1 second cool-down.
Dashing into an Angel (the lil orbs with dots in the middle) resets both your jumps and your dash cool-down!
You can also hold a directional button against a wall and continue tapping jump to scamper up it.
